remarks: A metric space is bounded iff the metric function maps to some bounded real interval.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 22-Sep-2015.)
statement:
isbnd3b $p |- ( M e. ( Bnd ` X ) <-> ( M e. ( Met ` X ) /\ E. x e. RR A. y e. X A. z e. X ( y M z ) <_ x ) ) $.
$d M x y z $.
$d X x y z $.
$d x y $.
